Engine state.

This module contains types that represent the current state of an Engine.

This module is part of the inner workings of the engine module.

Imports

../common, ../data, ../tracking

Types

ApuOperation = object
  updates*: array[ChannelId, ChannelUpdate]
  sweep*: Option[uint8]
  volume*: Option[uint8]
An operation or modification to be made to an ApuIo object. Stepping the Engine results in an ApuOperation
  • updates - A ChannelUpdate for each channel.
  • sweep - Write to the sweep register with this value when set.
  • volume - Write to the global volume register with this value when set.
Source   Edit   
ChannelAction = enum
  caNone,                   ## No action, do not update channel
  caUpdate,                 ## Update the channel by writing its registers
  caCut,                    ## Note stopped, turn DAC off
  caShutdown                 ## Channel was unlocked, zero the channel's registers
Specifies which action the channel should do when updating for a single tick. Source   Edit   
ChannelState = object
  envelope*: uint16
  timbre*: uint8
  panning*: uint8
  frequency*: uint16
State of a channel.
  • envelope - The envelope setting, 0..255. Use 0xFFFF to specify initial state.
  • timbre - The timbre setting, 0..3. Use 0xFF to specify initial state.
  • panning - The panning setting, 0..3. Use 0xFF to specify initial state.
  • frequency - The frequency setting, 0..2047. Use 0xFFFF to specify initial state.
Source   Edit   
ChannelUpdate = object
  case action*: ChannelAction ## The action to take.
                              ## 
  of caNone:
    nil
  of caUpdate:
    flags*: UpdateFlags      ## Determines which parts of `state` to update.
                             ## 
    state*: ChannelState     ## The current state of the channel
                             ## 
    trigger*: bool           ## If `true`, the channel should be retriggered.
                             ## 
  of caCut:
    nil
  of caShutdown:
    nil
Object that determines how a channel should be updated for a single tick. Source   Edit   
EngineFrame = object
  status*: TrackerStatus
  speed*: Speed
  time*: int
  pos*: SongPos
Informational data about the current engine frame being stepped.
  • status - current status of the music tracker.
  • speed - current playback speed of the song.
  • time - time index of the frame, first frame is 0.
  • pos - current position in the song.
Source   Edit   
UpdateFlag = enum
  ufTimbre,                 ## Update timbre setting
  ufEnvelope,               ## Update envelope setting
  ufPanning,                ## Update panning setting
  ufFrequency                ## Update frequency setting
Flags to indicate which part of the state has changed, and needs to be updated in the channel's registers. Source   Edit   
UpdateFlags = set[UpdateFlag]
A set of update flags to indicate only the parts of the state that has changed. Source   Edit  

Consts

updateAll = {ufTimbre..ufFrequency}
Update all settings Source   Edit  

Procs

func initChannelState(): ChannelState {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Initialize a ChannelState with initial settings. Using this state as an initial value will guarentee that all settings will be updated on the first tick. Source   Edit
